name: Leukocyte Virus Crusher for Android
description:
Game for Android.

The game is under development.

We are currently in level 8 of "Piece Of Cake" instance (8 of 13).

There would be many worlds (13, 26 or 39 levels each).

Consider donating to the project, it will be a "paid to download" game in the future, but all the donors will get the game for free, even beta releases.

Video preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cw5ZedYog3k&feature=youtu.be

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Leukocyte-Virus-Crusher-103458084658763/
